### Verse
Compose an epic poem of at least 200 words in [[verseStyle]]. Inspired by the heroic style of [[poet]], the poem must recount the source text's key points as a grand tale, with vivid imagery and rhythmic power. Ensure high fidelity to the original message, presented with epic scope and dramatic flair.

### Image Prompt
Craft a vivid prose description (75-150 words) for a text-to-image AI. Depict a single, dramatic scene from your epic, such as a hero confronting a mythical beast or a god intervening in human affairs. The style should be epic and mythological, like a classical fresco. Whenever something controversial or identifiably celebrity-related, generate media featuring animals or anthropomorphic animals instead, to keep the depiction spicy and engaging without direct human controversy.

### Video Prompt
Write a detailed prose description for a 6-8 second video clip. Show a sweeping, cinematic shot of the epic scene, with dynamic camera movement revealing the scale of the action. The style must be hyper-realistic and immersive. The audio should be a powerful, continuous orchestral piece, like a Wagnerian overture, mixed with stereo-panned epic sounds such as clashing swords or thunderous roars. Whenever controversial elements arise, feature anthropomorphic animals in heroic poses.
